ConfigurationOption.Value: select wonum, itemnum, description, itemqty, linecost, location, orgid, siteid, unitcost, wpitemid from wpmaterial where OrgID = 'LBNL' and SiteID = 'FAC'

List.ListEntry: wonum in (select wo.wonum from workorder wo where ( wo.lead = '${MX_LABOR_CODE}' or wo.wonum in (select lbl.refwo from lbl_labtrans lbl where lbl.lbl_transtype = 'PLAN' and lbl.laborcode = '${MX_LABOR_CODE}' )) and wo.status in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid = 'WOSTATUS' and maxvalue in ('APPR','INPRG') ) )
